item.title: 台湾三重紧缩政策缩减流动性指标
item.description: 台湾的三重紧缩因素正促使银行以有史以来最快的速度缩减购买中央银行存款的规模，这表明市场流动性正在萎缩。【原文：A triple whammy of tightening factors in Taiwan is pushing banks to scale back purchases of central bank deposits at the fastest pace on record, a sign that market liquidity is shrinking.】

item.title: 茅台将把中国第一大股票的桂冠拱手让给工商银行
item.description: 贵州茅台酒股份有限公司（Kweichow Moutai Co., Ltd.）似乎准备将中国最有价值的在岸股票的宝座拱手让给中国工商银行股份有限公司（Industrial and Commercial Bank Ltd.），因为这家白酒生产商正在努力应对批发价格的下跌。【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co. looks poised to lose its spot as China’s most valuable onshore stock to Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Ltd., as the baijiu maker grapples with tumbling wholesale prices.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国将日本列入货币观察名单。日元收于 34 年新低。华尔街交易员对股票买盘表现出疲态。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. The US adds Japan to its currency watchlist. The yen closes at a fresh 34-year low. Wall Street traders show signs of fatigue on stock buying. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国石油库存减少激励多头，石油将实现单周上涨
item.description: 由于美国库存水平意外下降以及需求强劲的迹象表明，世界第一大石油消费国的经济状况良好，石油连续两周上涨。【原文：Oil headed for a back-to-back weekly gain as a surprise draw in US inventory levels and signs of robust demand signaled buoyant conditions in the world’s top oil consumer.】

item.title: Citibanamex 调查报告以最后的悲观预测向我们告别
item.description: 墨西哥花旗银行（Citibanamex）的调查报告最后一次以其标志性品牌发布，因为母公司花旗银行准备在拟议的本地部门首次公开募股之前分拆业务。【原文：Mexico’s Citibanamex survey was published under its emblematic branding one last time, as parent company Citi prepares to split operations ahead of a proposed IPO of the local unit.】

item.title: 中国开发商面临清盘案决定成败的一周
item.description: 下周，四家违约的中国开发商将在香港法院就清算要求举行听证会，这标志着该行业有史以来最繁忙的清算阶段之一。【原文：Four defaulted Chinese developers are headed into Hong Kong court hearings on liquidation demands next week, marking one of the busiest such stretches ever for the sector.】

item.title: 主要美元指数飙升，收于年内最高水平
item.description: 由于美联储仍维持高利率，美元受益于此，衡量美元强弱的一个关键指标当天收盘创下年内最高收盘水平。【原文：A key gauge of the dollar’s strength ended the day at the highest closing level of the year as the US currency benefits from the Federal Reserve’s still-high interest rates.】

item.title: 韩国 "后台 "已为推动债券指数纳入做好准备
item.description: 所谓的韩国金融市场后台表示，韩国政府已为今年将主权债券纳入重要的全球基准做好了一切准备。【原文：The so-called back office of South Korea’s financial markets says it’s all set for the government’s push to get sovereign bonds into a key global benchmark this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将追随美国股市走低，日元成为关注焦点：市场综述
item.description: 由于美国股市在反弹至历史高位后出现买方疲劳迹象，多数亚洲股市准备下跌。在通胀数据公布之前，日元成为市场关注的焦点。【原文：Most Asian equity markets were poised to drop as US stocks fell amid signs of buyer fatigue after a rally to record highs. The yen was in focus ahead of inflation data that could draw a line under a six-day slump.】

item.title: MSCI 继续将韩国列为新兴市场，同时禁止做空
item.description: 在卖空禁令抵消了韩国争取升级为发达市场的努力之后，韩国一如预期仍被摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：South Korea remains classified as an emerging market by MSCI Inc., as expected, after a short-selling ban countered efforts by the country to get upgraded to developed status.】

item.title: Sycamore 的 Okada 表示，利率的长期化正在推动公共市场的发展
item.description: Sycamore Tree Capital 的马克-冈田（Mark Okada）周四在彭博电视上说，利率的长期走高使公共市场比私人市场更具吸引力。【原文：Higher-for-longer interest rates are making public markets more attractive than their private peers, Sycamore Tree Capital’s Mark Okada said Thursday on Bloomberg Television.】

item.title: 古尔斯比称，美联储可通过更多像五月份这样的通胀报告来下调利率
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，如果通胀率像上个月那样继续降温，决策者将能够降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said policymakers will be able to cut interest rates if inflation continues to cool as it did last month.】

item.title: 贸易伙伴因美元走强而挣扎，美国将日本列入货币观察名单
item.description: 美国财政部将日本列入其外汇行为 "监控名单"，但并未将日本或任何其他贸易伙伴列为汇率操纵国。【原文：The US Treasury Department added Japan to its “monitoring list” for foreign-exchange practices, but stopped short of labeling it or any other trade partner as a currency manipulator.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会对人工智能的打击预示着涓涓细流将变成洪水猛兽
item.description: 美国最近采取的一系列执法行动很可能只是打击向投资者过度宣传人工智能的公司的开始。【原文：A spate of recent US enforcement actions is likely just the beginning of a crackdown on companies overhyping artificial intelligence to investors.】

item.title: 禽流感首次影响德克萨斯州和堪萨斯州牛奶业
item.description: 美国的牛奶生产开始受到禽流感病毒的影响，今年早些时候，禽流感病毒首次传染给奶牛。【原文：US milk production is starting to get hit by the bird flu virus, which first made the jump to cows earlier this year.】

item.title: S&P 公司称，以太币重拾升势或将演变成 "互联网债券 "市场
item.description: 2021 年 1 月 22 日星期三，在罗马尼亚克卢日-纳波卡的 Evobits 加密货币农场，一名工程师正在对挖掘以太坊和 Zilliqa 加密货币的钻机进行诊断。全球价值第二高的加密货币以太坊今年上涨了 75%，超过了其较大的竞争对手比特币。摄影师：Akos Stiller/布鲁姆伯格【原文：An engineer runs diagnostics on rigs mining the Ethereum and Zilliqa cryptocurrencies at the Evobits crypto farm in Cluj-Napoca, Romania, on Wednesday, Jan. 22, 2021. The world’s second-most-valuable cryptocurrency, Ethereum, rallied 75% this year, outpacing its larger rival Bitcoin. Photographer: Akos Stiller/Bloomberg】

item.title: 对冲基金退伍军人为银行提供资本救济，同时兼顾环境、社会和治理因素
item.description: 随着银行越来越多地寻求将其信贷风险转移给监管较少的投资者，这些交易的另一方买家开始要求获得一个额外的特征：可持续性。【原文：As banks increasingly seek to transfer their credit risk to less regulated investors, buyers on the other side of those deals are starting to request an additional feature: sustainability.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，Revolut 希望出售 5 亿美元的现有股票
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，欧洲最有价值的初创公司之一 Revolut Ltd. 已聘请银行家帮助其出售价值约 5 亿美元的现有股票，其中包括一些员工持有的股票。【原文：Revolut Ltd., one of Europe’s most-valuable startups, has hired bankers to help it sell about $500 million worth of existing shares, including some held by staffers, according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 华尔街 5.5 万亿美元的 "三重魔咒 "考验市场冷静程度
item.description: 周五美国期权到期，可能会给缺乏波动性的交易者带来一些短期市场波动。【原文：Friday’s US options expiration may provide volatility-starved traders with some short-term market swings.】

item.title: Stifel 表示，S&P 今年有望在大幅下跌前达到 6,000 点
item.description: Stifel, Nicolaus & Co.公司认为，如果过去的市场狂热能起指导作用的话，S&P500指数今年可能会再上涨近10%。但该公司的首席股票策略师说，与以往的 "泡沫 "事件一样，这次也终将破灭。【原文：The S&P 500 Index could rally close to an additional 10% this year, if past market manias are any guide, according to Stifel, Nicolaus & Co. But like prior “bubble” episodes, this one eventually has to pop too, the firm’s chief equity strategist says.】

item.title: 耐克股票 "太贵"，分析师认为股价将下跌 20
item.description: 在耐克公司下周公布财报之前，一位华尔街分析师给投资者带来了一个信息："卖掉这只股票"【原文：Ahead of Nike Inc. reporting earnings next week, one Wall Street analyst has a message for investors: “Sell the stock.”】

item.title: 油砂集团因加拿大 "洗绿 "法而关闭网站
item.description: 在贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府通过了一项可能对所谓的 "洗绿 "行为处以巨额罚款的法律后，一个宣传加拿大油砂行业环保资质的行业组织删除了其所有在线资料。【原文：An industry group promoting the environmental credentials of Canada’s oil sands sector has removed all its online materials after Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government passed a law that could levy major fines for so-called “greenwashing.”】

item.title: 淡水河谷公布价值 33 亿美元的提高铜和镍产量计划
item.description: 淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）计划在未来四年内斥资多达 33 亿美元改善其在巴西和加拿大的采矿业务，以提高铜和镍的生产能力。【原文：Vale SA plans to spend as much as $3.3 billion on improvements at its mining operations in Brazil and Canada to boost copper and nickel production capacity over the next four years.】

item.title: 日元六日暴跌凸显日本干预风险
item.description: 日元有望创下 3 月份以来的最长连跌纪录，并有望创下 34 年来的收盘新低，这增加了日本官员再次出手支撑货币的风险。【原文：The yen is on track for its longest losing streak since March and poised to close at a 34-year low, ramping up the risk that Japanese officials will once again step in to prop up the currency.】

item.title: 黑客攻击汽车经销商，Brookfield Business Partners业绩下滑
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德商业合伙公司（Brookfield Business Partners LP）的主要投资项目之一--一家汽车经销商软件供应商--遭遇网络攻击后，该公司的连败态势得以延续。【原文：Brookfield Business Partners LP extended a losing streak after one of its top investments, a software provider for car dealerships, fell victim to a cyberattack.】

item.title: 如果美联储 7 月降息概率上升，两家大型博彩公司将从中受益
item.description: 美联储基金期货市场上的两笔大额押注抛开了市场对美联储首次降息的共识，从而吸引了华尔街的关注。【原文：A pair of large bets in the fed funds futures market are attracting attention on Wall Street by setting aside the market-implied consensus for the Federal Reserve’s first interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）称兰特是比索下跌后的套利新宠
item.description: 据杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：The South African rand is emerging as the new favorite bet against the low-yielder Japanese yen, stealing the spotlight from the Mexican peso for the lucrative carry trade, according to Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席根斯勒称英国和其他市场应加快货币结算速度
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会主席正在鼓励英国和其他国家缩短货币交易的结算时间，使其市场与亚洲和北美市场更好地接轨。【原文：The head of the Securities and Exchange Commission is encouraging the UK and others to shorten the settlement time for currency trading to better align their markets with those in Asia and North America.】

item.title: 塞浦路斯银行高层投资者探讨出售股权事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，塞浦路斯银行控股公司（Bank of Cyprus Holdings Plc）的两位顶级投资者正在探讨出售他们在这家该国最大银行的股份。【原文：Two of the top investors at Bank of Cyprus Holdings Plc are exploring a sale of their stakes in the country’s biggest bank, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
